flavors: Greatness at any cost.
Every victorious warrior draws his strength from the highest source; his love.
Warriors want a worthy opponent.
There is no redress in fighting the pathetic.
I am someone to fear, not hunt.
A warrior never worries about his fear.
Victory is reserved for those who are willing to pay it’s price.
From ashes I come, to ashes I go
What is life compared to death?
The more you sweat in training, the less you will bleed in battle.
The bravest warriors know when to retreat.
Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
"Courage is victory" - Malakhir
With faith on our side, all battles shall be won.
Wisdom is strength.
Knowledge is power.
Power is power.
It is easier to fight for one’s principles than to live up to them.
People who fight fire with fire usually end up with ashes.
"The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting." – Sun Tzu
Supreme excellence consists in breaking the enemy’s resistance without fighting.
"I can eat up to a thousand bananas a day, how much can you handle?" - a monkey, probably
No battle is worth fighting except the last one.
Rise above the shadow.
We create monsters and then we can't control them.
A monster is not dangerous. Not as long as it's asleep...
Those monsters are just like us, but uglier.
Good blood, bad blood.
Beastiality at its best.
A monster, even in the eyes of the gods.
Good or evil, a monster is a monster.
They linger in the shadows and stalk their prey from afar.
Swift and deadly. One strike from this beast and you are out.
You don't have to imagine what a walking killing machine would look like. Just look at this fellow!
What on earth is this?
Do you also wonder what it eats?
Do you also wonder what it eats? - That's right, humans!
No human is ever safe from those hainous monsters.
"Death and destruction, that's what those beasts have brought upon us." - Farmer
They are known to eat their victims alive.
Such a rare sight. Beautiful, but rather deadly.
No sword will save you from that!
Its skin is hard, its teeth are sharp. Don't go close.
For many sailors, this is what they see last before they die.
It may look harmless, but don't judge a book by its cover.
Don't judge a book by its cover.
This species is rarely encountered alone.
Its daily menu consits of basiliks, dragons, and other big lizards.
It wishes for a more pleasant meal, like some basilik, dragon, or any other big lizard.
It hungers for blood.
They usually come in numbers. Most towns are overwhelmed by their sheer force.
Humans have fought those bastards for over centuries. The battle is not yet won...
And so the fight begins...
"I would rather eat a broom than fight this ugly brute." - Broomeater Joe
"I would rather fight a broom than eat this ugly brute." - Broomfighter Sven
Magic becomes art when it has nothing to hide.
Never ever doubt in magic.
Magic is not a practice.
Real magic is not about gaining power over others: it is about gaining power over yourself.
Magic is believing in yourself, if you can do that, you can make anything happen.
The real secret of magic lies in the performance.
Effective magic is transcendent nature.
A little magic can take you a long way.
And where does magic come from?
Those who don't believe in magic will never find it.
There is no magic in magic, it's all in the details.
Boom goes the dynamite!
"Take that, you scoundrel!" - Lorelai
"In your face!" - Jace Beleren
The loss of magic is the denial of unlimited possibility.
Unlimited power!
"This may look like an experiment, but trust me, I know what I'm doing..." - Joe
In the eye of the storm, you are safe. Don't step out of it.
Don't do this at home.
Abominations have no right to exist.
Cleansing this planet from impurity will be the wizards' greatest achievement.
"You shall not pass!" - Gandalf
"Courage is victory" - Malakhir
In times of need, look for a purple star at night. It will guide you and grant you strength.
The chain is only as strong as its weakest link.
Putting an end this suffering is merciful, nothing else.
"Rest assured, this spell will go well." - Dave (died)
And so the fight begins...
Good or evil, a monster is a monster.
Knowledge is power.
Power is power.
Wisdom is strength.
With faith on our side, all battles shall be won.
People who fight fire with fire usually end up with ashes.
The worlds are at peace only when all evil has been cleansed from them.
Such savagery is not tolerated here.
Savagery is a sin and must be punished.
"Filth like you should never have left its lair!" - Aurius
There is more where that came from...
Defense is the best offense. Though, not all the time. Actually never. ATTACK!
Defense is the best offense.
The ideal space must contain elements of magic, serenity, sorcery and mystery.
The world is magic.
Life is dull without a little bit of trickery.
"This took me almost a year to create." - smirking lunatic
Let the flow of magic guide you, like a river guides a floating leaf.
A wizard is never late, nor is he early, he arrives precisely when he means to.
Don't mess with a wizard when he's wizarding!
Do not meddle in the affairs of Wizards, for they are subtle and quick to anger.
To the wizard, death is merely a belief.
Life is like a landscape.
Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
Choose only one master: nature.
Leave the road, take the trails.
By discovering nature, you discover yourself.
Nature is pleased with simplicity.
The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness.
Adopt the pace of nature. Her secret is patience.
Darkness grows in the shadows.
Once a place of power, now only a mere shadow of its former glory.
There are always flowers for those who want to see them.
Architectural perfection
"You made this? I made this." - Bob the builder
Any landscape is a condition of the spirit.
A place of power, it's gotta be.
"Medallion's humming!" - Geralt
Not all who wander are lost.
A fortress is of no use to cowards.
Different roads sometimes lead to the same castle.
You make kingdoms and castles on your own.
There is no rules of architecture for a castle in the clouds.
Don't be afraid to walk the longer road.
The key to victory is a strategical place for your stronghold.
What a sight to behold.
They say knowledge protect you better than castles. This begs to differ.
Your home is your castle.
Have fun storming the castle!
This place has withstood the rebirth of the Universe, do you think your petty army can tear it down?
"If you are ever going to build something, build this!" - Don
They don't have to know about the secret entrance.
Did you know that there is a secret entrance?
This is not a place to live, it is a place to fight.
"Don't deny it, this is way cooler than your stinking hobbit hole!" - Frodo, after living here
If a castle gets destroyed, you just build a new one.
Better positioned than Kings Landing.
Any relic of the dead is precious, if they were valued living.
The potential power is unlimited.
Do not think of it as just a jewel. You have yet to see the power it is capable of.
"A useless piece, nothing more." - Mats
My precious!
It is one of those lessons that every child should learn: Don't play with fire, sharp objects, or ancient artifacts.
Magic becomes art when it has nothing to hide.
What a sight to behold.
This artifact may be lost, but it will never be forgotten.
At least it doesn't have legs.
Even though it looks spectacular, it is actually only worth a few bucks.
Treasure beyond possession.
A family heirloom, passed down through hundreds of generations.
"A family heirloom, passed down through hundreds of generations. And you lost it?!" - Angry Pete
Nothing gives me more comfort than the smell of old scrolls and ancient relics.
You can tell by the Argulam obsidian used in the forging process, that this is not made by humans.
A hat for every head.
But that was the trouble with ancient artifacts - no one really knew what they did.
"Aside from the sunstrider orb, this is my favorite artifact" - Timmy
When I was young, they used to have all kinds of those items in every household. Now this is one of the only ones...
Forged by high-shadow elves of the Gulbar cliffs, this artifact eradiates immense waves of power.
Infused with the light of the Seven, this relict is worth more than you will ever know.
"I used to study those kind of artifacts, until some totem exploded in front of me" - some professor
This is true art.
This is but a worthless piece of equipment compared to the Staff of Gubargar.
Low and behold, an artifact so ancient, even the gods look young next to it.
An item such as this, that can withstand time itself, is the too potent to be held by you.
This was a mistake.
Every blackguard has such an item in his or her pockets. It is tradition.
Have you ever considered selling this item? The benefit would be huge.
Whoever holds this relic, it is said that this person becomes a monster after five moons exactly.
